name: Musashi (bitGlass Games)
description:
My goal is to make an action platformer with a twist to the core gameplay loop, which I'm keeping to myself for now in case it sucks =P  To get to the point where I can add a twist, however, I needed a basic action platformer to work with; which is this demo.  It's only one very short level, but now that I have the basics down I'm looking forward to adding more and of course putting my concept to the test.  For science ;-)

The main character, Joe Musashi, is owned by Sega as are most of the backgrounds.  The enemy sprites are owned by Natsume Inc.  These are just here as place holder art to roughly convey the look I'm going for. (also Shinobi kicks arse)
